adjectives.description: tossy (comparative more tossy, superlative most tossy)

entries.meaning: (dated) Tossing the head, as in scorn or pride; hence, proud, contemptuous, affectedly indifferent.
examples: "Honoria, take your feet off my dress. Argemone, my child, I hope you spent a pleasant evening?"Argemone answered by some tossy commonplace.
